0.text: Innate: Jax's basic attacks generate a stack of Relentless Assault on-attack for 2.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and stacking up to 8 times. Stacks expire by one every 0.25 seconds when the duration ends.
0.html: Innate: Jax's basic attacks generate a stack of Relentless Assault on-attack for 2.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and stacking up to 8 times. Stacks expire by one every 0.25 seconds when the duration ends.

1.text: Relentless Assault: For each stack, Jax gains 3.5% − 11% (based on level)  bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 28% − 88% (based on level).
1.html: Relentless Assault: For each stack, Jax gains 3.5% − 11% (based on level)  bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 28% − 88% (based on level).
markedPassages: 3.5% − 11% (based on level)  bonus attack speed
bonus attack speed
28% − 88% (based on level)

2.text: Grandmaster at Angling: While out of combat and idle in the river, Jax will occasionally catch a fish, granting him  1.
2.html: Grandmaster at Angling: While out of combat and idle in the river, Jax will occasionally catch a fish, granting him 1.
markedPassages: 1

0.text: Active: Jax  dashes to the target unit's location.
0.html: Active: Jax dashes to the target unit's location.
markedPassages: dashes

1.text: If the target is an enemy and they are in range upon arrival, Jax deals them physical damage.
1.html: If the target is an enemy and they are in range upon arrival, Jax deals them physical damage.

2.text: Jax can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
2.html: Jax can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Jax can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Jax empowers his next basic attack or  Leap Strike against an enemy within 10 seconds to deal bonus magic damage. If Empower is used on a basic attack, it will gain  50 bonus range.
0.html: Active: Jax empowers his next basic attack or Leap Strike against an enemy within 10 seconds to deal bonus magic damage. If Empower is used on a basic attack, it will gain  50 bonus range.
markedPassages: Leap Strike
50 bonus range

1.text: Empower  resets Jax's basic attack timer.
1.html: Empower resets Jax's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Empower  resets Jax's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Jax enters Evasion for 2 seconds: a defensive stance that causes him to  dodge all incoming non- turret basic attacks and take 25% reduced damage from all area of effect abilities from  champions.  Counter Strike can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically after the duration.
0.html:
Active: Jax enters Evasion for 2 seconds: a defensive stance that causes him to dodge all incoming non- turret basic attacks and take 25% reduced damage from all area of effect abilities from champions.

Counter Strike can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically after the duration.
markedPassages: dodge
turret
champions

1.text: Recast: Jax deals magic damage to nearby enemies, with the total damage increased by 20% for each attack dodged, up to a 100% increase, and  stuns them for 1 second.
1.html: Recast: Jax deals magic damage to nearby enemies, with the total damage increased by 20% for each attack dodged, up to a 100% increase, and stuns them for 1 second.
markedPassages: stuns

0.text: Passive: Jax's basic attacks generate a stack of Grandmaster-At-Arms  on-hit for 2.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits and stacking up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage. While Grandmaster-At-Arms is active, the empowered attack triggers at 1 stack instead.
0.html: Passive: Jax's basic attacks generate a stack of Grandmaster-At-Arms on-hit for 2.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits and stacking up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage. While Grandmaster-At-Arms is active, the empowered attack triggers at 1 stack instead.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: Active: Jax swings his lantern around, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. If this hits a champion, he gains  bonus armor, increased for each champion hit beyond the first, and  bonus magic resistance equal to 60% of that amount as well as 10% increased size for 8 seconds.

bonus magic resistance
